caption: Growlers, atmosphere, foosball, pool. It's worth it just for that.  But what am I talking about!? Get in there and choose from one of the best hand selected beer menus in the San Fernando Valley.
Nice place to come hangout and drink some beers. They have plenty of options from hazy’s, sours, ipa, and the list goes on. Also their food is good.
BEST craft beers, great vibe and service, yummy food. It has all the things I love.
Simply put... awesome.
Nice open sitting area and the inside is very inviting. Great place to stop by and get a drink or catch up with friends.
Great beer better service love this place
I absolutely LOVE this place. They know my favorite beer and I'm super excited that there are vegan options.
Amazing service. Great ambience. I came here once, got hooked. Beware, the beers will hit the spot.

If I could give this place ten stars, I would! From the minute you step through those doors, you notice the impeccable attention to detail: the wood—charcoal  juxtaposition on the walls set the ambiance, the redwood tables are chic (and …

Love Brews Brother's! Been coming here since they opened and the owners are some really kind and awesome people. The environment feels very friendly all the time and (before covid of course) they had games available like boardgames, a pool table and a shuffleboard table. The food is tasty and there are many beers to try on tap!
The place is first-rate and broad, the food was yummy and the rates were very reasonable. quick, productive service and very amiable waiters. I highly recommend this place.
THIS PLACE HAS TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. VERY RUDE SERVICE. Avoid this place. Food is only ok. Go elsewhere

Phenomenal service and a great beer selection, even had my favorite beer,  La Fin Du Monde. The staff is extremely friendly and accommodating, and they have an awesome atmosphere. Theres a young man with tattoos working the front; he is …

Covid is hard on us all, so why not go to Brews Bros where you can be taken care of? From their select crafts, to delicious sandwiches, and stellar service--It is always a win. PLUS if you really wanna support local, this is the spot to do it. Cannot promote this place enough!
visited on a wednesday i think. will surely make a return trip.

Really love this place. I just moved in down the street and this is my new go-to spot. The brothers who own and run the place and super friendly and knowledgeable. I recently discovered my new favorite beer here called The Pupil. Can't wait to go back and try more.
Outdoor Patio!!!!!
cool place to meet and catch up with coworkers. fast and courteous service. prices were reasonable.

Brews Brothers is one of my favorite Brazilian barbecues in SoCal.  Everything is high quality here, from the salad bar to all the grilled meats to the service.  Definitely a great restaurant among so many in Koreatown.

This place has a great atmosphere with good options. You can't go wrong with any choice, the quality is perfect. They have such a fun environment with games to play and live music. You definitely gotta check this place out. It's a good time for sure, they have super good food options.

Brews Bros did an amazing job making our COVID restaurant experience feel safe, positive, and appreciated. Our small party felt well-attended to, and the outside space was roomy and comfortable despite all of the crazy measures that …
Staff was very nice and the food was very very delicious

Great brewery! Amazing service and I've spoken to the owners really great guys. It's amazing what they've done to the place. Food is delicious and well priced beer has a wide selection this places doesn't disappoint. They have pool tables.
Great spot for craft beer and awesome food. Outdoor patio and indoor seating available.
Amazing place! Great beer! Fantastic customer service! I went there for the first time in November of 2018 for a friend's birthday, and I've been going ever since.
Loved the environment and the beer/ cider selection
A lot of fun for kids playing pool and foosball
Over 40 selections of beer! Yummy sours! The spicey sauce on the tacos creeps up on you and lingers for a minute.
Fantastic spot with games, food, and great beer— just what NOHO needed!
Good beer selection. Decent food options.
The space is great: big, cavernous, high wood-beamed ceilings, pool tables, shuffleboard, lots of seating. Reasonable but not awesome beer selection.

This place knows their beers. So cheesy you say but where you're there you're family. Small bites  amazing brews and they have a fantastic comedy night that is a hidden gem. If you like stout might I suggest the 9th Anniversary which is on …
Some pool and drinks!
Best list in NoHo
Great beer, cool place and good food.

Had the smallest Grilled Cheese Sandwich EVER! which cost over $10 and they don't serve fries,  (because they don't have a fryer), the staff were unfriendly also... I won't be going back.  Poor value for money!

Extensive beer selection that highlights regional breweries. Owner is both friendly and knowledgable. Decor and vibes both amazing. Pool tables and shuffle board available for playing. Must go if in the area. Food menu is simple, but delicious. I recommend the double brie burger.

Everything you want in a bar.  I'm a big fan of beer. And as the name suggests, the owners of this bar are too. What's so impressive about them, however, is that they have an ever changing and always well balanced, quality beer list. They …
Great selection of craft beer
Awesome little meet up for some good food and decent brews!

Great beer selection. Prices seemed high, but I guess I’m not used to California prices. Very good service. Disappointed with my pork sandwich. It just seemed very bland. The cauliflower appetizer was good. My wife enjoyed her Picnic Soppressata sandwich.
Great food great beer! I had the Hula Cow and I hope they keep that in their repetoir forever because it's the best beer I've ever had.

Good for a date or friend-drinks. Perfect food spot for a NoHo pub crawl.  Solid selection of beers, good food!  Enough food / drink options for the possible sober / vegan / otherwise-dietary-restricted friend in your group too, as long as you know to warn the staff.
Good beer

Great beer selection and small bites, too! Sliders and pretzel were delicious. My only criticism is that we wanted one of the channels changed so we could watch a different game but request was denied.  Not sure if all the screens had to play the same channel.
Great Beer and foodie place
Love this place! Fun bar games, clean, awesome beer menu! Check this place out fersure!!!! ❤️💜💜❤️
Great fun with lots of attractions

Awesome 42 tap beer list, that is ever changing, mouth water beer friendly food. They offer beer braised pork and Brisket sandwiches witch are fabulous. Inviting large open space with plenty of seating, they have several pool table, a foosball table and shuffleboard.👍👍

Hi everyone ! Hopefully this review helps . I have visited different brewery around California , another states even out of the United States and let me let you this brewery is worth visiting . The service is kind and friendly and know …
Good beer, Foosball, pool, shuffleboard. Good times.
Fantastic atmosphere, great service. Impeccable beer menu. 10/10 must go here
Was really cool. Had a headache from a day hangover, so drinking wasn't top on my list.  But they had a good list and we had the brisket sliders and they were tasty.
Friendly staff, chill environment, and fun agmes.
Great atmosphere, rare and exciting beer choices, great food and games. Love this place.
Love this bar. It gets a bit hot in the summer since they tend to go with the open air setup. 5 stars in comfortable days, 4 stars on hot days.

Best bar in North Hollywood arts district currently. Layout has the best space and never feels claustrophobic regardless of how many people are there. Craft beer selection is excellent and always changing, owners are very knowledgeable and …
Tasty brews...nice people!
Good alcohol, ok service, rude staff.
The list was solid enough, the service was a little meh.  The person behind the bar was nice enough, but the food was slow and the person that brought it to me was very standoffish.
Great ambiance, the owners are beer guru's and the decor is beautiful! Foods really good and fresh!

This is an amazing craft Brew bar in the NoHo/ Valley area. The two brothers that opened it literally helped build the beautiful interior themselves after years of helping run some of the most successful bars and restaurants in Los Angeles …
Wow! Who knew NoHo had great places to eat? I will be back.

So great to finally have another beer joint in my neighborhood - giving NoHo more choices. I enjoy the atmosphere especially when they open their doors making it more inviting. The owners are very friendly. Also I like their selection of beers.
Lots of open space, kind of a weird set up. (No direct path from the bar to the bathroom) good selection of craft beer and wine, no liquor license. 2 pools tables, shuffle board, decent music

Came here for the first time yesterday and it was amazing. The service was on point and the drinks and food were even better. The layout is great with plenty of tables to sit with your friends. Two pool tables and a foosball table. The vibe is very chill. Order a cheese and charcuterie board, a few beers and enjoy!
Good food. Great beer selection. Vibe is always chill. Best beer bar in NoHo.
Bad service at the bar ..... l

I stopped by one night after work with some friends and they had a free comedy show going on upstairs. It was hilarious. Everyone was super funny and the show wasn't too long which I appreciated.  Amazing bar in a great location with a huge beer selection. I highly recommend.
Serious beer people. Selection on tap is solid.
Great beer
Friendly vibe, great beer selection.
Great spot! Great new edition to the NOHO area!!  Two Pool tables, and craft beers on tap!!! Also dog friendly!! Recommend!!
One of the best tap houses in LA. Awesome food.
Great new beer spot for NoHo, excellent selection of beers and the two brothers who own it re very knowledgable and cool as hell :)
Love this place, can’t wait to go back! The food was good, and the beer was delicious 😍 Joey was also a great help
Awesome brew choices and the service was incredible. Nice warm friendly atmosphere. Would def visit again.
Really fun spot with games and great drinks.
Love the place,food was delicous, took a minute to get a drink.
Got to try a new beer.  Recommendations were on point.  A place for some foosball fun!
Excellent craft beer and tasty eats.
Great place, good beer, they play the music they like and there is never a DJ.  Thank the beer gods for that.
Great selection of beer, friendly bar staff not a bad word to say about the place

Best NoHo destination for craft beer by far. Excellent salads, sandwiches, innovative sides and appetizers. A friendly feel that goes with the craft wood decor and a meticulous approach to every menu item, beer or wine.
Quite new location for all those who like beer. Friendly staff. Wish them all the best and success.
Great atmosphere, drinks, and food! I love the smoked salmon sandwich.
Great selection of brews, free pool, shuffle board and connect four 😁👍

I was talking with a friend earlier about the lack of sour beer options in most L.A. bars early on the night of 3/15, and later that night happened to be introduced to Brews Brothers. Centrally located in North Hollywood, this space is …

This place has a fantastic variety of craft beer, with great small bites/plates as well. I had a really good Belgian style Saison, and tasted a collaboration with Anderson Valley they had on tap along with a delicious Belgian Strong ale as …
Brews brothers is becoming the after work hang out spot with me and my buddies, good beer, good food, good vibes.
Brews Bros is great!  Great vibe, good people, and you got to love any place with a Foosball table and a great beer selection.  Also, the tuna melt is fantastic.
Our crowd was the party. Place was a little boring. Needs good music. Waiters were cool. Doorman was dope.

This place definitely has potential. The atmosphere is really cool and they do have a pretty good menu for bar food. My husband and I unfortunately had a terrible experience and will definitely not be back. To start off the night I wanted …
Went in for a break, got a vacation. Think i fell for a server, gd spot.
A little crowded but that's a good thing for a new bar. Great menu with easy to share healthy options. FREE GAMES!
Cozy brewery with great grub!
Cool new bar! Awesome atmosphere. Best craft beer in CA!

This is a brand new place. (Everything is closing down on Lankershim right here.) I went with two friends of mine for lunch. The space is great; lots of nice big windows, beautifully restored brick walls, cement floors, tables lacquered …
Always really good beers on tap.  Owners are knowledgeable about beer and can help you find something you like.  Chipotle chicken sandwich is awesome.
Wide selection of beers, a handful of board games, and assorted table games. The pool is broken though, all my shots kept missing.
Cool new spot for beer and pub food in NoHo. The hummus and pretzel was good. Good beer selection too. There's 2 pool tables.
Loved the beer selection, pretzel and staff.

Great beer selection, sandwiches and the Pretzel was outstanding. Both brothers were very personable and extremely knowledgeable about the beers with plenty of spot on suggestions if you are having a hard time deciding what to drink next.
Owners are awesome, good beer selection, pretty relaxed atmosphere.
A truly great selection of brews!
First time there tonight - great beer selection, good music, warm vibe, tvs stay on late, and the owner's dog chills on the 2nd floor overlooking the bar like it's his kingdom. So awesome.
Food is great, the beer selection is top notch and the service is awesome.

The Cyclekillers showed up to check out Brews Brothers, from the owners of STOUT.  The place has great craft beer and specialty craft ales, along with pool tables, shuffleboard and foosball.  Come check the place out!
Food is good the beers are frost and the environment is perfect place to chill and either watch a game or play pool or foosball if your game. They have fooseball!

This place definitely has a lot of potential to be a staple here in NoHo! There’s tons of seating and games to play. As far as food there’s a few appetizers and then a variety of sandwiches to choose from. The beer selection is broad …

Great beers, the chai Solstice was great. Nicely built out space. Go here if you want to sit down and sip an expensive beer before your night out. The perfect place for a tinder date. One less star for putting up fake reviews 5 months ago when they don't need it.
Wow. Amazing chipotle chicken sandwich. I came in for the beer, which is baller, and fell in love with the food.

My husband and I live just down the street from Brews Brothers and we've been waiting for it to open all year!  We went last Monday and it was just fantastic. The owners are super cool and very friendly, the food was incredible (apps, …
(Translated by Google) thanks to sandwiches  (Original) dank sandwiches
Decor is spot on. You can lose yourself in a craft beer, pool tables, fooseball, or some relaxed conversation during the week. Great spot with sincere owners.  Great addition to the neighborhood!

I was here opening weekend, it is unfortunate there are fake reviews that are five months old...  That said, I've never been to a better working restaurant on the opening days. It was literally under construction a week ago...  Service was …
A great place to grab a craft beer and a sandwich.
A 6 month labor of love, this place has a great warm vibe and varied beer selection with nice sandwiches to munch on. I look forward to frequenting this place often!
Try the Salmon Cream Cheese sandwich! Not to mention the INCREDIBLE beer selection.  ☺️🤘
Gr8 new place
It is not open. Other reviews are fake. Looking forward to the opening.
An incredible space with an industrial atmosphere and great selection of beers
The best sandwiches in town, paired with some of the most eclectic craft beers on tap! Yum!
Come here and get a different beer everyday! 40 rotating taps of the best and rarest beers in Los Angeles!
